name: Cake, space and two smoking extinguishers
name_original: Cake, space and two smoking extinguishers
description:
DESCRIPTION

Little game about an austranaut, who was unfortunate to have his birthday exactly the same day his spaceship crashed. The Cake is the only thing left... Be courageous,don't let the cruel space to take it too!

Controls: W, A, D. The goal is to get to the Cake.

Credits: made by @introvertsdump; thanks to EdwardTG; sfx by Shapeforms; music by sscheidl;
